title: https://example.com/toolA/docs
body: Tool A (an AI-powered code assistant) is not working as expected. More details at [Tool A documentation](https://example.com/toolA/docs). It uses advanced machine learning.

title: https://example.com/toolB/nlp_feature
body: It would be great if tool B (a natural language processing toolkit) could do X. See https://example.com/toolB/nlp_feature for a similar request.

title: https://example.com/visioncraft
body: Check out this new tool for computer vision tasks: https://example.com/visioncraft. It's amazing for generating images from text.

title: http://example.com/llm_summary
body: This Large Language Model summarizer is top-notch: http://example.com/llm_summary

title: https://example.com/pandasgui
body: PandasGUI for dataframe analysis. Not explicitly AI but used in ML workflows. https://example.com/pandasgui
